forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers for the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers for the afternoon. High 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 26F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Decreasing cloudiness late. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening becoming partly cloudy late. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow after midnight. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
